props.query: SELECT average(`mysql.node.query.insertPerSecond`) * uniqueCount(entityName) as 'Insert Commands', average(`mysql.node.query.selectPerSecond`) * uniqueCount(entityName) as 'Select Commands', average(`mysql.node.query.updatePerSecond`) * uniqueCount(entityName) as 'Update Comands', average(`mysql.node.query.deletePerSecond`) * uniqueCount(entityName) as 'Delete Commands' FROM Metric TIMESERIES until 1 minutes ago
props.title: Operations per second

props.markdown:
::: beyond
 **MySQL** 

MySQL is the world's most popular open source database. With its proven performance, reliability, and ease-of-use, MySQL has become the leading database choice for web-based applications.

The MySQL integration provides different parameters to control the metrics that are captured.


:::

props.query: SELECT average(`mysql.node.query.queriesPerSecond`) * uniqueCount(entityName) as 'Queries' FROM Metric TIMESERIES until 1 minutes ago
props.title: Queries per second

props.query: SELECT average(`mysql.node.query.slowQueriesPerSecond`) * 60 as 'Slow Queries' FROM Metric TIMESERIES until 1 minutes ago facet entityName
props.title: Slow Queries per minute, by node

props.query: SELECT latest(`mysql.node.net.threadsConnected`) as 'Active Connections' FROM Metric until 1 minutes ago facet entityName
props.title: Active Connections, by node

props.query: SELECT max(`mysql.node.net.threadsConnected`) as 'Max Connections' FROM Metric TIMESERIES facet entityName
props.title: Max Connections, by node

props.query: SELECT average(`mysql.node.innodb.dataReadBytesPerSecond`) * uniqueCount(entityName) as 'Read InnoDB Data', average(`mysql.node.innodb.dataWrittenBytesPerSecond`) * uniqueCount(entityName) as 'Write InnoDB Data' FROM Metric TIMESERIES until 1 minutes ago
props.title: Read vs Written InnoDB Bytes per second

props.query: SELECT average(`mysql.node.net.bytesReceivedPerSecond`) * uniqueCount(entityName) as 'Bytes Received', average(`mysql.node.net.bytesSentPerSecond`) * uniqueCount(entityName) as 'Bytes Sent' FROM Metric TIMESERIES until 1 minutes ago
props.title: Received vs Sent Bytes per second
